title: Bug 15830Encapsulate field should allow visibility selection
description: I love this feature! It is very common to create publicgetters/setters for private or protected fields. It's a little tedious to haveto manually change this every time. Plus, visibility can (or could) affect howmuch code needs to be changed. It would be better to get it right the first time.
EB: Bug 15830Encapsulate field should allow visibility selection It would be even better if the first page of the dialogallowed selection of visibility.
